title: Bounding boxes computed differently depending on physics engine

content.raw:
There is a test for computing the bounding boxes of collision shapes added in pull request #1053 (per issue #1146), but it only passes in ODE.

~~~
[ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/Issue1146Test.BoundingBox/0
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 192.168.1.11
2014-04-03 17:57:39.613 REGRESSION_1146_collision_bounding_box[14016:1303] invalid drawable
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:144] ServerFixture load in 2.6 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:95] ServerFixture::Unload
[       OK ] PhysicsEngines/Issue1146Test.BoundingBox/0 (2804 ms)
[ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/Issue1146Test.BoundingBox/1
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 192.168.1.11
2014-04-03 17:57:41.459 REGRESSION_1146_collision_bounding_box[14016:1307] invalid drawable
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:144] ServerFixture load in 1.6 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
/Users/scpeters/ws/gazebo/src/gazebo/test/regression/1146_collision_bounding_box.cc:49: Failure
Value of: math::Box(math::Vector3(-0.5, -0.5, 0), math::Vector3(0.5, 0.5, 1))
  Actual: Min[-0.5 -0.5 0] Max[0.5 0.5 1]
Expected: coll->GetCollisionBoundingBox()
Which is: Min[-0.5 -0.5 -0.5] Max[0.5 0.5 0.5]
/Users/scpeters/ws/gazebo/src/gazebo/test/regression/1146_collision_bounding_box.cc:56: Failure
Value of: math::Box(math::Vector3(9.5, 14.5, 19.5), math::Vector3(10.5, 15.5, 20.5))
  Actual: Min[9.5 14.5 19.5] Max[10.5 15.5 20.5]
Expected: coll->GetCollisionBoundingBox()
Which is: Min[-0.5 -0.5 -0.5] Max[0.5 0.5 0.5]
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:95] ServerFixture::Unload
[  FAILED  ] PhysicsEngines/Issue1146Test.BoundingBox/1, where GetParam() = "bullet" (1794 ms)
[ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/Issue1146Test.BoundingBox/2
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 192.168.1.11
2014-04-03 17:57:43.257 REGRESSION_1146_collision_bounding_box[14016:130b] invalid drawable
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:144] ServerFixture load in 1.6 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
/Users/scpeters/ws/gazebo/src/gazebo/test/regression/1146_collision_bounding_box.cc:49: Failure
Value of: math::Box(math::Vector3(-0.5, -0.5, 0), math::Vector3(0.5, 0.5, 1))
  Actual: Min[-0.5 -0.5 0] Max[0.5 0.5 1]
Expected: coll->GetCollisionBoundingBox()
Which is: Min[0 0 0] Max[0 0 0]
/Users/scpeters/ws/gazebo/src/gazebo/test/regression/1146_collision_bounding_box.cc:56: Failure
Value of: math::Box(math::Vector3(9.5, 14.5, 19.5), math::Vector3(10.5, 15.5, 20.5))
  Actual: Min[9.5 14.5 19.5] Max[10.5 15.5 20.5]
Expected: coll->GetCollisionBoundingBox()
Which is: Min[0 0 0] Max[0 0 0]

Value of: math::Box(math::Vector3(-0.5, -0.5, 0), math::Vector3(0.5, 0.5, 1))

[  FAILED  ] PhysicsEngines/Issue1146Test.BoundingBox/2, where GetParam() = "simbody"
